AlohaCare Advantage Plus/AlohaCare Advantage (HMO D-SNP) is an HMO D-SNP with a Medicare contract and a contract with the Hawai`i Medicaid Program. Enrollment in AlohaCare Advantage Plus/AlohaCare Advantage depends on contract renewal.

paragraph.string: Health and wellness or prevention information

Dear {patient_full_name},

As part of your Prominence Health plan, we’re pleased to welcome you into our Medication Therapy Management (MTM) program. Because you meet the program criteria based on the number of medications you take, the number of health conditions you have, and your annual prescription costs, you’ve automatically qualified for this important program. There is no cost to participate.

simply_prescriptions.English: As part of your Simply Prescriptions Medicare plan, we’re pleased to welcome you into our Medication Therapy Management (MTM) program. Because you meet the program criteria based on the number of medications you take, the number of health conditions you have, and your annual prescription costs, you’ve automatically qualified for this important program. This service is free to you and can help you save money.

items: Address any questions or problems you have about your medications

Provide advice on how to get the most benefit from the drugs you take
Provide guidance on topics to discuss with your provider

paragraph.string: You won’t need to switch pharmacies to participate in this program, and you can continue to use any Priority Health Medicare network pharmacy to fill your prescriptions.
To schedule your comprehensive medication review call 1-844-387-1839
To schedule your comprehensive medication review call 1-808-973-7418.
To schedule your comprehensive medication review call 1-866-575-3199
To schedule your comprehensive medication review call {hotline_phone}

Participation is optional. If you do not wish to participate, call Customer Service toll-free at 1- 844-387-1839 (TTY users should call 711), from 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. PST, Monday through Friday. You may continue to receive calls throughout the year until a formal request has been processed. If you remain a Prominence Health Plan member, you can rejoin the program at any time. You may be offered MTM services again next year if you continue to qualify for the program.

We look forward to helping you live a healthier life.

Sincerely,

Prominence Health Plan

Don’t want to participate?

Participation is optional. If you do not wish to participate, call Customer Service toll-free at 888.389.6648 (TTY users should call 711), seven days a week from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. Or complete and return the attached form, and we will remove you from the program. You may continue to receive calls throughout the year until a formal request has been processed. If you remain a Priority Health Medicare member, you can rejoin the program at any time. You may be offered MTM services again next year if you continue to qualify for the program.

We look forward to helping you live a healthier life.

Sincerely,

Jacob Chaffee, PharmD
Director of Pharmacy

Don’t want to participate?

You may continue to receive calls throughout the year until a formal request has been processed. If you remain an iCare Medicare member, you can rejoin the program at any time. You may be offered MTM services again next year if you continue to qualify for the program.

We look forward to helping you live a healthier life.

Sincerely,

iCare
